snippet: The Mark Morris Dance Group returned to the Brooklyn Academy of Music with an exuberant premiere, set to Beethoven, and “Four Saints in Three Acts.”
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance works by choreographer Mark Morris, including premiere of his piece A Choral Fantasy, performed by the Mark Morris Dance Group at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: The Mark Morris Dance Group returned to the Brooklyn Academy of Music with an exuberant premiere, set to Beethoven, and “Four Saints in Three Acts.”

headline.seo: Mark Morris Dance Group at BAM Opera House
headline.main: Frolicking With Bubbly Saints and Marching With the Band
headline.print_headline: Frolicking With Bubbly Saints And Marching With the Band
